title: Statement by White House Press Secretary Robert Gibbs, 08-04-09 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




August 04, 2009

 



Statement by White House Press Secretary Robert Gibbs, 08-04-09




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  _________________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                      August 4, 2009  Statement by White House Press Secretary Robert Gibbs   "While this solely private mission to secure the release of two Americans is on the ground, we will have no comment. We do not want to jeopardize the success of former President Clinton's mission."
